She is passionate about leading a purpose-driven business that creates a healthier world. Since moving to Pine Lake in 2014, Brandy has been actively involved—from volunteering on the Zoning Ordinance Committee commissioned to update the zoning codes in 2015, to serving on City Council for the subsequent 7 years. As Mayor, she brings her passion for sound fiscal, organizational, and environmental stewardship to serve her small, but mighty community. You can email Mayor Hall at brandyhall@pinelakega.net . Council Members Jean Bordeaux Jean Bordeaux moved to Pine Lake from Decatur in 2010 with her partner, Gayle. Both had recently retired and were looking for a friendly community where they could enjoy all that “free time”. Having become familiar with the Architectural Review Board while doing a renovation on their house, Jean became a member of the Board in early 2011 and served as Chair from late 2012 until the end of 2014 at which time the ARB was disbanded. Prior to retirement, Jean worked over thirty years in various financial positions including Controller and Audit Manager for a Fortune 50 company and Financial Reporting Manager for a mid-size Software Company. During her first term in Council she drew from her financial and administrative experience to analyze the city's budget, create and study various annexation scenarios and to lead the committee that launched the new Website in early 2018. You can email Council Member Bordeaux at jeanbordeaux@pinelakega.net . Augusta Woods Augusta Woods moved from Michigan to Georgia more than 20 years ago and has lived in Pine Lake for 5 years with her husband Dwight. She has two children a son and a daughter (and son in law) and two step daughters. She has served on the Pine Lake Comprehensive Plan Steering Committee and attends Pine Lake Baptist Church. Over the years, she has had a number of jobs from working at a non-profit as Coordinator of Harvest Home, a transitional home for single mothers to Retail Manager and Co-Owner of New Life Wardrobe Services, an image consulting company teaching people the art of putting on a professional image. Augusta served on the Saginaw City Planning commission in Michigan. She is currently semi-retired and working part time as an independent contractor for Glacier’s Industrial Supplies Company. You can email Council Member Woods at augustawoods@pinelakega.net . Jeff Goldberg Jeff has called Pine Lake home since 1996. His involvement in the community began many years ago when he was appointed to serve on the Pine Lake Human Relations Committee. He has also chaired the Pine Lake Environmental and Stewardship Committee (PLEAS), and Pine Lake Tree Board. Jeff owns Live & Learn Consulting LLC, where he creates, designs, manages, and delivers experiential training experiences focused on Leadership and Team Development. He collaborates with colleges, universities, not-for-profit, and for-profit organizations. Additionally, Jeff has been working with the North Carolina Outward Bound School since 1990.  Jeff also worked as a trainer for the Anti-Defamation League for over 20 years. In his spare time, Jeff volunteers with Camp Sunshine which is a year-round program supporting kids with cancer and their families.  Jeff has been involved with Camp Sunshine since 1988 and still volunteers at a week-long summer camp and many weekend programs. Jeff enjoys gardening and making art out of found objects, many of which end up in his yard. You can email Council Member Goldberg at jeffgoldberg@pinelakega.net . Thomas Torrent Thomas Torrent fell in love with Pine Lake years before he and his husband Tim were able to move here. He immediately got involved with Pine Lake's active and welcoming community, first with pancake breakfasts and then volunteering for pretty much every event. With the help of PLAIN and so many supportive neighbors, he launched Pine Lake's first annual Pride event, PrideLake, in 2022. He is dedicated to maintaining the city's unique charm and character while preparing for the challenges of a rapidly approaching future. You can email Council Member Torrent at thomastorrent@pinelakega.net . Tom Ramsey Tom moved to Pine Lake in 2017, and he has been actively engaged in the community ever since. Serving as a volunteer and board member for the Pine Lake Association of Involved Neighbors, provided Tom with the opportunity to connect with neighbors and city officials to help make things happen for our community. He has two daughters and three granddaughters, all living in Metro Atlanta. Tom brings 45 years of executive management experience to his role as Council Member. After a successful career in the filtration industry, Tom current stays engaged as a Board Member for ECS Environmental Solutions, and as a Consultant for Clarity Corporate Growth. In his spare time, Tom is a founding member of the Driveway Ramblers, a local ukulele band, an avid photographer, loves walking around our park and wetlands, and likes to travel, especially to our National Parks. You can email Council Member Ramsey at tomramsey@pinelakega.net . © 2025  All rights reserved. | Site Map | Accessibility

Welcome to Pinelake Village, A Retirement Community, A 55 plus Manufactured Home Community. Pinelake Village, A Retirement Community... A 55 plus Manufactured Housing Community. L ocated in beautiful Jensen Beach, Florida. Pinelake Village offers an active Florida lifestyle! Please take a look at what Pinelake Village can offer you! Home Sales Residency Application Rules & Regulations News Events Contact ABOUT US At Pinelake Village, we offer a relaxed friendly and easy life for you, in a modern manufactured home community. Our 55 plus manufactured home community is beautifully designed and located in Martin County, Jensen Beach, Florida.  Strict, low-density specifications of 5.8 units per acre is your assurance that your community will always remain uncrowded. OUR FACILITIES Our clubhouse is the gathering place in our community for committee meetings, social events, or just to relax with friends.  In our clubhouse, we support a furnished kitchen, large inlaid teak dance floor with a surround sound system, library, exercise room, Billiard room and a card room.  Outside is a large swimming pool, spa and shuffle board courts. OUR RESIDENTS We have many wonderful people that make up the heart of Pinelake Village.  Our residents enjoy a variety of planned events such as Wii bowling, water aerobics, Poker, golf, potluck dinners, scheduled parties, game night, Bridge, boat rides, trips to the Jupiter Theater, West Palm Beach Zoo, baseball games and many other fun activities. Please visit our site and see the wonderful things we have to offer you in a one of Florida's finest 55 plus manufactured housing communities! Pine Lake Law Firm, PLLC top of page HOME ABOUT TESTIMONIALS SERVICES PRACTICE LISTINGS NEWS & EVENTS CONTACT STAR OF THE NORTH 2021 PINE LAKE DENTAL LAW & TRANSITIONS Pine L ake is a dental law and transitions firm dedicated to guiding dentists from dental school gradua tion through retirement. Our practice focuses on dental practice transitions, associate contracts, estate planning, on-going business needs and conflict management. Just like our clients, we are a small professional business. Our team knows first hand what it is like to buy, sell and run a practice. We take that expertise and knowledge to help our clients become successful practice owners. ​ OUR TEAM HAS OVER 35 YEARS EXPERIENCE IN THE DENTAL INDUSTRY Set up your complimentary initial consultation today! What our clients are saying “ I could not be more impressed with the service Hillary provided throughout my entire dental practice buy-in process. From the very beginning, she played a critical role – she brought fresh ideas and expertise that helped restructure a long-time, family-owned dental practice into a successful partnership. She was extremely knowledgeable, professional and an amazing advocate for me. She was always prompt in her communication, and really helped simplify a process that seemed overwhelming at the beginning. Hillary truly went above and beyond, and I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for an expert in dental law! Mark Spaude, DDS – Owner at Elk Dental Center (Elk River, MN) See More Testimonials HERE ” OUR TEAM Hillary Harms Becchetti, JD Attorney & Practice Transitions Broker Hillary Harms Becchetti, grew up in the dental world. She is Pine Lake's founder, dental attorney and practice transition broker. Since opening Pine Lake, Hillary has become the premier dental attorney and now broker for Minnesota and South Dakota dentists. Hillary is also a national dental speaker. To learn more about Hillary click HERE. Kimberly Harms, DDS Practice Transitions Specialist & "The Dental Mediator" Kimberly Harms, DDS is a retired dentist, a transition specialist, dental mediator and conflict management consultant. During her dental career, Dr. Kim's expertise was unmatched. Not only did she run a dental practice with her husband for 30 years, she was a former MN Dental Association President, National Delegate, national dental speaker, ADA Spokesperson and Consumer Advisor.  Now she helps dentists with their practice transitions and conflict management as well as continues to speak across the country. To learn more about Dr. Harms click HERE. Ashley O'Connor, JD Attorney Ashley O'Connor also grew up in the dental world, her first job being in her parent's dental office.  Ashley has joined Pine Lake Law Firm as a dental attorney, working in the Kansas City area. To learn more about Ashley click HERE . Buyers & Associates Dental Practice Transitions Pine Lake firmly believes that every buyer in a dental practice transition and associate that was just hired should be represented. We pride ourselves in being advocates for our buying dentists and associates. We ensure each buyer and associate understands the process and are protected. Contact us to learn more! Sellers & Employers Dental Practice Transitions Pine Lake will work diligently to sell your practice for the best price possible. We are solid advocates for our sellers  and we use our numerous industry contacts to find the right buyer or associate for you! If you already have a buyer or associate, we work with  you to navigate the transition  and hiring process. Contact us to learn more! In House Counsel & HR Services This popular service is affectionately called our "hygiene" service. Just as dentists and hygienists counsel prevention to their patients, we take the same approach to practice owners. Our in-house counsel service allows practice owners near unlimited acces to our attorney and other professionals in order to  hopefully prevent issues before they arise as well as maintain your corporate records. Contact us to learn more! Estate Planning, Lease Review & Real Estate Dentists have unique estate planning needs and we use our expertise in the dental industry to ensure your estate is in order. Every practice owner will either have a lease or own their building , so it is important for dentists to have an experienced attorney to help them navigate their lease or real estate transaction. Contact us to learn more! Conflict Management Pine Lake offers an entirely unique conflict management service. Our dental mediator can consult a dental practice on conflict, train a conflict manager in your dental practice and serve as a formal mediator.  Check out the bottom of our Services page (tab on top center)for a free Conflict Management Webinar. Click here to learn more. Contact Pine Lake for your complimentary initial consultation Name* Email Address* Message* SUBMIT WHAT SETS US APART? -Over 35 Years Experience in the Dental Industry -Responsive: our professionals are extremely responsive to inquiries and work quickly and diligently on your matter -Communicative: We are in constant communication with our clients to keep them informed and updated. -Respectful: We treat our clients with the utmost respect. We want each client to feel as if they are our only client. -Outside the Box: Our professionals like to think outside the box. Every transaction is different and we work to come up with solutions that fit our clients' specific needs. -Women Owned: Pine Lake is the only solely women owned dental law and transition firm in MN. -Small Business Owners: Just like a dental practice owner, Pine Lake is a small, local business. This give us a unique perspective into our client's needs. -Reasonable & Competitive Fees:  We know how expensive legal representation can be. We work very hard to keep our overhead low so we can pass those savings onto our clients. As a result, you receive high quality legal representation, brokerage and other services at a reasonable rate. Complimentary Consultation: Pine Lake offers a complimentary initial  consultation to all prospective clients. Contact us today to set up your complimentary consultation. HILLARY BECCHETTI, JD hillarybecchetti@pinelakelawfirm.com Direct: 651-428-2253 ASHLEY O'CONNOR, JD ashley@pinelakelawfirm.com Direct: 651-214-4074 KIMBERLY HARMS, DDS drkim@pinelakelawfirm.com Direct: 651-214-4073 Office Hours Address **Please Note Our New Address** Minnesota Office: 222 So. 9th Street, Suite 1600 Minneapolis, MN 55402 Kansas City Office: 7301 Mission Road, Suite 244E Prairie Village, KS 66208 Hours Office Visits : Mon-Fri 8:30-5:00 (By Appointment Only) Phone Calls & Emails : 7:00 am - 3:00 pm. However, w e can take evening and weekend phone conferences to fit your busy schedule. We recommend making an appointment for phone conferences to ensure availability, but we do our best to answer when you call or email.
